StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetContrac.ngGoalViewForRegion]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @Region int AS
SELECT OM_DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AS DIST_ORGANIZATION_ID, OM_RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS_ORGANIZATION_ID, RS.SHORT_NAME, MC.MONTH_CODE, CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, CMP.MISSION_VALUE FROM CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN CMP INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM_RS ON CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM_RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS ON OM_RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM_DIST ON OM_RS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = OM_DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION DIST ON OM_DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE MC ON CMP.MONTH_CODE = MC.MONTH_CODE WHERE RS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND OM_DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Region AND CMP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND CMP.MONTH_CODE > 0 AND CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE != 'DIST' ORDER BY DIST.SHORT_NAME, RS.SHORT_NAME, CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, MC.DISPLAY_ORDER
